channel.title: 000webhost
channel.description: hey mopar I have just registered a domain for my rsps. I was told that the first 24 hours the link will be dead for everyone and will not load. Is this true? And if not I just registered a domain and I went to the domain and it said the domain is not used, does it take a while until the domain finally works? if so how long

im using name cheap

item.title: 000webhost
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:3, topic:462641”]The first 24 hours involves registering the domain, setting up the web host account, copying over the files, setting up the administration account for the website, setting the nameserver attributes of the domain, configuring the webserver to listen for that domain, etc. Basically all of that can happen within 5 minutes. DNS propagation, on the other hand, is said to take 12-24 hours to complete, but that’s not to say you can see it within a few minutes depending on what DNS servers you’re using for domain lookups.

Fu ruby. D:[/quote]
no no i set up the domain servers, on namecheap
i dont know if i did it right,

i put these in = ns01.000webhost.com
ns02.000webhost.com

but it has 2 IPs accross from each of those, what do i do with the IP’s.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Taharok:

Fu ruby. D:

If you’re not fast you’re last

You explained it in more detail though, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

The first 24 hours involves registering the domain, setting up the web host account, copying over the files, setting up the administration account for the website, setting the nameserver attributes of the domain, configuring the webserver to listen for that domain, etc. Basically all of that can happen within 5 minutes. DNS propagation, on the other hand, is said to take 12-24 hours to complete, but that’s not to say you can see it within a few minutes depending on what DNS servers you’re using for domain lookups.

Fu ruby. D:

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:1, topic:462641”]hey mopar I have just registered a domain for my rsps. I was told that the first 24 hours the link will be dead for everyone and will not load. Is this true?
And if not I just registered a domain and I went to the domain and it said the domain is not used, does it take a while until the domain finally works? if so how long[/quote]

The domain must propagate first so it is only usually accessible through the ip adress for anywhere from immediately to 24 hours, just hang in there

Read full topic
